Download the InLong releases

Use the links below to download the Apache InLong from one of our mirrors.

InLong

Date Version Comment Downloads
August. 4th, 2020 0.5.0 Source [SRC] [PGP] [SHA512]
Client [TAR] [PGP] [SHA512]
Server [TAR] [PGP] [SHA512]

Release Notes

New Features

  • [INLONG-122] Increase JAVA version collection of SDK environment
  • [INLONG-163] Flume sink for TubeMQ
  • [INLONG-197] Support TubeMQ connector for Apache Flink
  • [INLONG-238] Support TubeMQ connector for Apache Spark Streaming
  • [INLONG-239] support deployment on kubernetes

IMPROVEMENTS:

  • [INLONG-46] Correct some spelling issues
  • [INLONG-53] fix some typos
  • [INLONG-55] fix some typos
  • [INLONG-57] fix some typos
  • [INLONG-58] fix some typos
  • [INLONG-60] Remove unnecessary synchronized & using IllegalArgumentException instead of IllegalStateException
  • [INLONG-61] minor update & fix some typos
  • [INLONG-64] minor update & fix some typos
  • [INLONG-67] remove synchronized & fix some typos
  • [INLONG-71] using IllegalArgumentException & fix some typos
  • [INLONG-73] remove duplicate codes & some minor updates
  • [INLONG-74] minor updates for DefaultBdbStoreService
  • [INLONG-75] remove unused Logger
  • [INLONG-76] rename the classes
  • [INLONG-77] fix typo
  • [INLONG-79] fix typo
  • [INLONG-80] Fix some typos
  • [INLONG-82] Fix some typos & update comments
  • [INLONG-83] Fix some typos
  • [INLONG-87] Minor updates
  • [INLONG-89] Minor updates
  • [INLONG-90] Remove unused codes in TubeBroker
  • [INLONG-91] replace explicit type with <>
  • [INLONG-93] Substitute the parameterized type for client module & missed server module
  • [INLONG-94] Substitute the parameterized type for core module
  • [INLONG-95] Substitute the parameterized type for server module
  • [INLONG-96] Fix typo & use IllegalArgumentException
  • [INLONG-98] Fix typo & Simplify 'instanceof' judgment
  • [INLONG-100] Fix typos & remove unused codes
  • [INLONG-101] Optimize code & Fix type
  • [INLONG-103] Substitute Chinese comments with English
  • [INLONG-108] About maven jdk version configuration problem
  • [INLONG-127] Fixed a bug & minor changes
  • [INLONG-128] Shorten the log clearup check cycle
  • [INLONG-138] Optimize core module test case code
  • [INLONG-141] Remove the requirement to provide localHostIP
  • [INLONG-152] Modify the master.ini file's annotations
  • [INLONG-154] Modify the wrong comment & Minor changes for example module
  • [INLONG-155] Use enum class for consume position
  • [INLONG-156] Update for README.md
  • [INLONG-166] Hide bdbStore configs in master.ini
  • [INLONG-167] Change to relative paths in default configs
  • [INLONG-168] Example module: remove localhost IP configuration parameters
  • [INLONG-170] improve build/deployment/configuration for quick start
  • [INLONG-196] use log to print exception
  • [INLONG-201] [Website] Adjust user guide & fix demo example
  • [INLONG-202] Add protobuf protocol syntax declaration
  • [INLONG-213] Optimize code & Minor changes
  • [INLONG-216] use ThreadUtil.sleep replace Thread.sleep
  • [INLONG-222] Optimize code: Unnecessary boxing/unboxing conversion
  • [INLONG-224] Fixed: Unnecessary conversion to string inspection for server module
  • [INLONG-226] Add Windows startup scripts
  • [INLONG-227] remove build guide in docker-build readme
  • [INLONG-232] TubeBroker#register2Master, reconnect and wait
  • [INLONG-234] Add .asf.yaml to change notifications
  • [INLONG-235] Add code coverage supporting for pull request created.
  • [INLONG-237] add maven module build for docker image

BUG FIXES:

  • [INLONG-47] Fix some typos
  • [INLONG-102] Fix question [INLONG-101] [Optimize code]
  • [INLONG-121] Fix compilation alarm
  • [INLONG-139] a bug in the equals method of the TubeClientConfig class
  • [INLONG-157] Optimize Broker disk anomaly check
  • [INLONG-158] nextWithAuthInfo2B status should be managed independently according to Broker
  • [INLONG-159] Fix some typos
  • [INLONG-165] Remove unnecessary fiiles
  • [INLONG-205] Duplicate dependency of jetty in tuber-server pom file
  • [INLONG-206] There are some residual files after executed unit tests
  • [INLONG-210] Add log4j properties file for unit tests
  • [INLONG-217] UPdate the je download path
  • [INLONG-218] build failed : Too many files with unapproved license
  • [INLONG-230] TubeMQ run mvn test failed with openjdk version 13.0.2
  • [INLONG-236] Can't get dependencies from the maven repository
  • [INLONG-253] tube-consumer fetch-worker cpu used too high
  • [INLONG-254] support using different mapping port for standalone mode
  • [INLONG-265] Unexpected broker disappearance in broker list after updating default broker metadata
